ygData.subject: Re: Educating the masses
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to say that one more than a couple of occasions I ve been told that I m the best bard that they ve been grouped with. While it may sound like I m
ygData.messageBody:
I have to say that one more than a couple of occasions I've been told that
I'm the best bard that they've been grouped with.

While it may sound like I'm patting myself on the back - I want to add that
I feel the major reason I'm as good as player as I am is from reading this
mailing list...

Slyde of Xegony
Level 17

----- Original Message -----
From: Roop Dirump <roop@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 8:51 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Educating the masses


> From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
> There is a bard I grouped with, around level 17 or so. She was decked in
> full bronze, and just bellowed (I have bronze, but only the smaller
pieces.
> This is because, of course, I don't think the pants and chest are worth
it.)
> I asked her why she never used Anthem, and she told me "bellow works
better
> for me." Mmm, ok whatever. Later, with her guildmates, we had to regroup
